summary: The generic views package supplies a collection of reusable class‑based view base classes and mixins that implement common web‑application patterns such as object listing, detail display, form‑based create/update/delete operations, and date‑based archive pages. It handles query retrieval, pagination, URL date parsing, context preparation, and template rendering, allowing developers to subclass and customize behavior with minimal boilerplate.
business_intent: Enable Django developers to rapidly build standard CRUD and archive pages by providing ready‑made, extensible view components that encapsulate common logic, thereby reducing development time and ensuring consistent implementation across projects.
